casebody.data:
Christopher and Lynn GRESHAM
v.
Donna DUFOUR; Safeco Insurance Company of America; the State of Louisiana, Through the Department of Public Safety and Corrections; Office of State Police; East Baton Rouge Sheriff's Office; Sid J. Gaureaux, III as Sheriff of East Baton Rouge; City of Baton Rouge and Horace Mann Insurance Company NO. 2018-CC-1729 Supreme Court of Louisiana. January 8, 2019

Denied.
